info.description:
This is an API designed to work with joesangiorgio.com.
It serves 2 purposes 
1) Provide static JSON content to populate pages within the domain
2) Scrape content from wikipedia for 'skills' section of joesangiorgio.com
info.title: Joe Sangiorgio API

get.summary: Get static content of specified item

get.description: Returns a map of status codes to quantities

parameters.name: slug
parameters.description: Name of thing to be defined [must match wikipedia slug]
